class_notes:
(Permission of Instructor Required Prior to Enrollment)


The course will be taught 50% by Liesl Wuest and 50% by Dr. William Wuest.
BPART is a new teaching/undergraduate research class program that will focus on teaching graduate students how to develop their own class. BPART 2 (in the spring) will ensure that gradaute students are meeting their goals in the undergraduate course they lead.
schedule_location: MW 10am-11:15am in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E363
